column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I really enjoyed my experience here. The truffle fries are DELICIOUS and the service was exceptional. However
column4: and I felt like the quality of my ramen suffered. The soup was
column6: flavorless. The bowl was also overflowing with cabbage to the point that it was very difficult to eat. However
column7: my friends who ordered meat-based ramens raved about their meals! So
column8: unless you're a vegetarian or vegan
column9: this is a must-try for Houston.
